ControlRelease.description: Steering and driving functions must only be activated if a release has been given via the ControlRelease interface. The Start Permission manager (SPM) provides this release.ControlRelease (Service Interface Driving / Method ControlRelease)

TakeoverControl.description: To be able to control the vehicle remotely, a requester must send a TakeoverRequest (Service Interface Driving / Method TakeoverControl)

BEG.description: All body components specific to BEG Demo Car.

PedalPosition.description: Accelerator pedal position as percent. 0 = Not depressed. 100 = Fully depressed.

Speed.description: Rotational speed of a vehicle's wheel.

SpeedSet.description: Set Required Rotational speed of a vehicle's wheel.

BrakePedalSwitch.description: Set the Brake Pedal Switch Value true or Fasle

Angle.description: Steering wheel angle. Positive = degrees to the left. Negative = degrees to the right.

AngleCoordReq.description: Steering wheel angle. Positive = degrees to the left. Negative = degrees to the right.

ControlPosition.comment: Single track two-axle model steering angle refers to the angle that a centrally mounted wheel would have.
ControlPosition.description: Single track two-axle model steering angle. Angle according to ISO 8855. Positive = degrees to the left. Negative = degrees to the right.

ControlRelease.description: Steering wheel Control. True  = Released. False = Not Released.

Chassis.description: All data concerning steering, suspension, wheels, and brakes.

Config.description: Current Immobilizer config (how the In-/Outputs are logically connected)
